attributes.action: Take steps to ensure the legal costs incurred by Craig Hudson are paid by the prison official who took the case to court.
attributes.additional_details: This was a ludicrously BAD judgement call by whoever decided this case should go to court.  As well as making sure they get to pay the bill, the Home Secretary needs to review their suitability to be in a job which has access to taxpayer pounds.  THEY  OBVIOUSLY HAVE NO AWARENESS OF NOR ANY RESPECT FOR THE TAXPAYER.
